subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – a forked tongue emerging upwards from a mouth ({{zh-l|*口}}).

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text: From {{och-l|舐|to lick}} + {{m|och||*-t|nominal suffix for natural objects|sc=Latn}}, literally “licker” ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
